sentences.sContent: Dozens of villages have been razed.
sentences.sCn: 几十座村庄已被夷为平地。

sentences.sContent: Cities such as Berlin and Dresden were virtually razed to the ground.
sentences.sCn: 诸如柏林和德累斯顿这样的城市基本上被夷为平地。

synos.tran: 夷为平地；破坏；消除；拆毁

remMethod.val: 彻底破坏 (raze) 一个种族 (race)

words.tran: 被夷平（raze的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: If buildings, villages, or towns are razed or razed to the ground, they are completely destroyed
